landing.title: Caawinta Go'aanka Daaweynta Keliyaha
landing.subtitle: Adeegyada Keliyaha ee NHS
landing.description: Qalabkan wuxuu kaa caawin doonaa inaad fahanto doorashooyinkaaga daaweynta keliyaha iyo inaad ka fikirto waxa kugu muhiimsan. Wakhti qaado - jawaabo sax ama qalad ah ma jiraan.
landing.learnMore: Wax badan ka baro Cudurka Keliyaha
landing.featuresSubheading: Wax walba oo aad u baahan tahay si aad u sameyso go'aan cilmi ku dhisan oo ku saabsan daaweyntaada keliyaha

time.title: Waxay qaadataa ilaa 15 daqiiqo
time.description: Ku dhamee xawlihisaaga. Waad iska nasan kartaa markasta oo aad u baahan tahay oo ku soo noqon kartaa meesha aad ka tagtay.

privacy.title: Gaarasiintaadu Waa La Ilaaliyay
privacy.description: Ma jirto macluumaad shaqsi ah oo la kaydiyay. Jawaabahaagu waxay caawinayaan in qalabka laguugu habeeyo inta lagu jiro kulanka keliya.

devices.title: Waxay ku shaqeysaa Aaladaha Oo Dhan
devices.description: Ku isticmaal telefoonkaaga, tablet-kaaga, ama kombiyuutarkaaga. Qalabku wuu isugu habeyaa cabbirka shaashadaada si toos ah.

about.paragraph1: Caawintaan go'aanka waxay kaa caawin doontaa inaad sahamiso doorashooyinka kala duwan ee daaweynta ee laga heli karo fashilka keliyaha. Waad baran kartaa daaweyno kasta xawligaaga, ka fikir waxa aad ugu mudan, oo u samee koobid aad la wadaagto dhakhtarkaaga ama kalkaalisadaada.
about.paragraph2: Waxaad ka jawaabi doontaa dhowr su'aalood oo fudud oo ku saabsan xaaladaada, ka dibna sahami daaweyno ku habboon. Macluumaadkaagu wuu qarsoonyahay mana la kaydiyo ka dib markaad xidhto browserka.
about.paragraph3: Qalabkan ma beddelo talooyinka caafimaadka ee kooxda daryeelkaaga keliyaha. Waxaa loo sameeyay inuu kaa caawiyo inaad dareento wareysi badan oo isku kalsoon markaad kala hadleyso doorashooyinkaaga. Kooxda keliyahaaga ayaa khubaro ku ah daryeelkaaga waxayna kaa caawin doonaan inaad sameyso go'aanka kugu haboon.

trust.accessible: Waxa heli kara isticmaalayaasha oo dhan

landing.ctaDescription: Qaado talaabada ugu horeysa ee fahanka doorashooyinka daaweynta keliyahaaga. Waad bilaabi kartaa hadda oo ku soo noqon kartaa mar dambe haddii aad u baahan tahay nasasho.

language.title: Dooro Luqaddaada
language.instruction: Fadlan dooro luqadda aad doorbideyso. Waxaad beddeli kartaa wakhtiga kasta.
language.confirmChangeMessage: Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad beddesho luqadda {{language}}? Dhammaan qoraalka waa la cusboonaysiin doonaa.

privacy.title: Gaarasiintaada & Macluumaadkaaga
privacy.subtitle: Ka hor intaadan bilaaban, waxaan rabnaa inaad fahamto sida qalabkan uu u maareeyo macluumaadkaaga.

privacy.title: Sida Aan U Ilaalineyno Macluumaadkaaga
privacy.content: Jawaabahaaga waxaa loo habeeyaa si ammaan ah mana la kaydiyo si joogto ah. Qalabkan ma ururriyo macluumaad caafimaad shaqsiyeed oo ku aqoonsan kara. Xogta kulanka waxaa si toos ah loo tirtirayaa markaad xidhto qalabkan.
privacy.p1: Qalabkan wuxuu isticmaalaa kaydinta kulanka keliya. Macluumaad kasta oo aad geliso, oo ay ku jiraan jawaabahaaga su'aalaha iyo doorashooyinka daaweynta, waxaa keliya la hayaa inta aad isticmaalayso qalabka.
privacy.p2: Markaad xidhto browserkaaga ama ka dib 15 daqiiqo oo aan wax la falinin, macluumaadkaaga oo dhan waa la tirtiraa si toos ah. Ma kaydinno wax ku saabsan adiga.
privacy.p3: Waxaan ururinaa macluumaad aan la aqoonsan karin oo ku saabsan sida dadku u isticmaalaan qalabkan si aan u hagaajinno. Tani ma kuu aqoonsan karto shakhsi ahaan.

ai.title: Sida Qalabkan U Shaqeeyo
ai.content: Caawintaan go'aanka waxay isticmaashaa tignoolajiyada si ay u bixiso macluumaad shakhsiyeysan oo ku salaysan jawaabahaaga. Macluumaadka la bixiyay wuxuu ka soo baxay tilmaamaha caafimaadka ee NHS iyo cilmi-baarista ku salaysan caddeymo. Qalabkan wuxuu taageeraa laakiin ma beddelo wadahadallada kooxda daryeelka keliyahaaga.
ai.p1: Qalabkan wuxuu ku jiraa kaaliye AI ah oo ka jawaabi kara su'aalaha guud ee ku saabsan daaweynta keliyaha. AI-gu wuxuu bixiyaa macluumaad keliya - ma bixin karo talo caafimaad oo gaar ah oo ku saabsan xaaladaada.
ai.p2: AI-gu mararka qaar wuu qaldami karaa ama wuxuu bixin karaa macluumaad aan dhammaystirnayn. Had iyo jeer kala hadal go'aamada muhiimka ah kooxda keliyahaaga kuwaas oo yaqaan taariikhda caafimaadkaaga oo dhan.
ai.p3: Qalabkan ma beddelo talooyinka kooxda daryeelkaaga caafimaadka. Waxaa loo sameeyay inuu kaa caawiyo inaad dareento wareysi badan markaad kala hadleyso doorashooyinkaaga dhakhaatiirtaada iyo kalkaalisooyinkaaga.

medical.title: Macluumaad Caafimaad Muhiim ah
medical.content: Qalabkan wuxuu bixiyaa macluumaad guud oo ku saabsan doorashooyinka daaweynta keliyaha. Ma aha baddalka talada caafimaadka xirfadlayaasha, baarista, ama daaweynta. Had iyo jeer la tasho takhasusliga keliyahaaga ama kooxda daryeelka caafimaadkaaga ka hor intaadan go'aamiinin wax ku saabsan daaweyntaada. Haddii aad qabto walaaco caafimaad degdeg ah, fadlan la xiriir GP-gaaga ama wac NHS 111.

pii.title: Fadlan Ha Wadaagin Faahfaahinta Shakhsiga
pii.intro: Si aad u ilaaliso gaarasiintaada, fadlan ha gelin macluumaad shaqsiyeed oo ku aqoonsan kara markaad isticmaalayso qalabkan, gaar ahaan shaqada sheekaysiga.
pii.outro: Weli waad noo sheegi kartaa xaaladaada siyaabo guud - tusaale ahaan, xaaladda noloshaada ama waxa aad ugu muhiimsan - adigoon wadaagin faahfaahin ku aqoonsan kara.

consent.title: Fadlan xaqiiji si aad u sii waddo
consent.understand: Waan fahmay in macluumaadkayga aan la kaydinayn ka dib kulanka iyo inaan wadaagin macluumaad shaqsiyeed oo i aqoonsan kara
consent.analytics: Waan ogolahay in la ururiyo falanqeyn aan la aqoonsan karin si loo caawiyo hagaajinta qalabkan (ikhtiyaari)
consent.error: Fadlan xaqiiji inaad fahamtay macluumaadka gaarasiinta ka hor intaadan sii wadin

encouragement.start: Bilow safarkaaga adigoo sahamaya doorashooyinka daaweynta
encouragement.beginning: Bilow fiican! Sii sahami si aad wax badan u barato
encouragement.halfway: Wax ka badan badkii - waa ku fiican tahay!
encouragement.almost: Ku dhow dhammaystiir! Qaar yar oo qaybooyin ah
encouragement.complete: Aad u fiican! Wax walba waad sahamiyay

journey.title: Halkee Ku Jirtaa Safarka Daryeelka Keliyahaaga?
journey.subtitle: Dooro doorashada ugu fiican ee tilmaamaysa xaaladaada
journey.instruction: Dooro doorashada ugu fiican ee tilmaamaysa xaaladaada hadda
journey.intro: Safarka keliyaha qof kasta way ka duwan tahay. Si aan kuu tusno macluumaadka ugu khuseeya, fadlan noo sheeg halka aad hadda joogto. Ma jiraan jawaabo sax ama qalad ah.
journey.error: Fadlan dooro doorashada tilmaamaysa xaaladaada. Haddii midkoodna uusan kuugu habboonayn, dooro "Waxaan taageero qof qoyska ah ama saaxiib" si aad u sii waddo.
journey.legendLabel: Dooro halka aad ku jirto safarkaaga keliyaha
journey.audioText: Halkee ku jirtaa safarkaaga? Dooro doorashada ugu fiican ee tilmaamaysa xaaladaada.
journey.reassurance: Ha welwelin haddii aadan hubin doorashada ugu fiican ee kugu haboon. Had iyo jeer waad sahamin kartaa dhammaan doorashooyinka daaweynta, kooxda keliyahaagana waxay kaa caawin karaan inay kuu caddeeyaan xaaladaada. Doorashadaadu waxay naga caawineysaa inaan kuu tusno macluumaadka ugu khuseeya marka hore.
journey.needHelp: Waxaan u baahanahay caawin si aan u dooro

suspected.title: Waxaan u maleynayaa inaan qabo cudurka keliyaha
suspected.description: Waxaad ka walaacsantahay caafimaadka keliyahaaga oo waxaad rabtaa inaad wax badan ka barato waxa uu yahay cudurka keliyaha.

earlyDiagnosis.title: Ayaa hadda la ii ogaaday - CKD marxaladdiisa hore
earlyDiagnosis.description: Dhawaan ayaad wax ka baratay xaaladda keliyahaaga waxaadna rabtaa inaad fahamto waxa ay tani kuu tahay.

lateDiagnosis.title: Waa la ii ogaaday - CKD marxaladdiisa dambe
lateDiagnosis.description: Shaqada keliyahaagu aad ayay u hoos u dhacday waxaana laga yaabaa inaad u baahan tahay inaad ka fikirto doorashooyinka daaweynta dhowaan.

choosingTreatment.title: Waxaan u baahanahay inaan dhowaan dooro daaweyn
choosingTreatment.description: Kooxda keliyahaagu waxay kuu sheegeen inaad u baahan doonto inaad bilowdo daaweyn bilaha soo socda waxaadna rabtaa inaad wax ka barato doorashooyinkaaga.

transplantPending.title: Waxaan samayn doonaa beddelid - waxaan rabaa inaan wax badan ka baro
transplantPending.description: Waxaad ku jirtaa liiska sugitaanka bedddelida ama waxaad leedahay deeq bixiye nool oo la habeeyey waxaadna rabtaa inaad wax badan ka ogaato waxa la filaayo.

dialysisPending.title: Waxaan bilaabi doonaa dialysis - waxaan rabaa inaan wax badan ka baro
dialysisPending.description: Dhowaan ayaad bilaabi doontaa daaweynta dialysis-ka waxaadna rabtaa inaad fahamto noocyada kala duwan iyo sida nolasha maalinlaha ahi u noqon doonto.

supporting.title: Waxaan taageero qof qoyska ah ama saaxiib
supporting.description: Qof kuugu dhow ayaa qaba cudurka keliyaha waxaadna rabtaa inaad fahamto doorashooyinkooda si aad u caawin karto taageeradooda.

helpModal.title: Ma u baahan tahay caawin doorashada?
helpModal.intro: Waa caadi inaad dareento hubin la'aan doorashada ugu fiican ee ku tilmaamaysa. Waa kuwan talooyinyo:
helpModal.tip1Text: Maxay kooxda keliyahaagu kuu sheegeen shaqada keliyahaaga iyo talaabooyinka xiga?
helpModal.tip2Title: Ka fikir waxa ku keenay halkan
helpModal.tip2Text: Ma dhakhtar ama kalkaaliso ayaa ku siiyay qalabkan? Waxay laga yaabaa inay soo jeediyeen marxalada ku khusaysa.
helpModal.tip3Text: Dooro doorashada ugu dhow ee xaaladaada. Weli waad sahamin kartaa dhammaan macluumaadka qalabkan, iyadoon loo eegin doorashada aad doorato.
helpModal.note: Kooxda keliyahaagu waa khubaro ku ah daryeelkaaga. Haddii aad qabto su'aalo ku saabsan caafimaadka keliyahaaga, fadlan si toos ah ula xiriir.

intro.title: Noo Sheeg Wax ku Saabsan Naftaada
intro.description: Su'aalahani waxay naga caawiyaan inaan kuu tusno macluumaadka ugu khuseeya xaaladaada. Jawaabahaagu waa qarsoodi mana la kaydiyo ka dib kulankan.
intro.skipText: Haddii aadan doonayn inaad ka jawaabto su'aalahan, waad ka boodi kartaa macluumaadka daaweynta ee guud.

knowledge.title: Intee in le'eg ayaad ka taqaanaa cudurka keliyaha iyo daaweyntiisa?
knowledge.hint: Tani waxay naga caawineysaa inaan macluumaadka u habeeyno fahamkaaga hadda.

goal.title: Maxaad rabtaa inaad ka hesho kulanka maanta?
goal.hint: Dooro doorashada ugu fiican ee tilmaamaysa hadafkaaga ugu weyn maanta.

learning.title: Sidee ayaad doorataa inaad barato macluumaad cusub?
learning.hint: Tani waxay naga caawineysaa inaan macluumaadka u soo bandhigno siyaabaha kuugu fiican.

comfort.title: Intee le'eg ayaad ku raaxaysataa naqshadaha caafimaadka?
comfort.hint: Tani waa mawduuc xasaasi ah. Waad ka boodi kartaa su'aashan haddii aad doorbideyso.

support.title: Ma leedahay taageero guriga?
support.hint: Daaweyno qaarkood way fududahay iyada oo laga caawiyay qoyska ama daryeel bixiyeyaasha.

living.title: Xaggee ayaad ku nooshahay?
living.hint: Tani waxay naga caawineysaa inaan fahanno daaweyno ku habboon deegaankaaga guriga.

priorities.title: Maxaa kuugu muhiimsan doorashada daaweynta?
priorities.hint: Mudnaantaadaadu waxay naga caawin doontaa inaan iftiimiyno waxa kuugu muhiimsan doorashada daaweyn kasta.

hints.selectAll: Dooro dhammaan kuwa khuseeya - waad dooran kartaa in ka badan hal doorasho.

learnBasics.label: Baro aasaaska
learnBasics.description: Waxaan rabaa inaan fahmo waxa uu yahay cudurka keliyaha iyo doorashooyinka daaweynta ee la heli karo

compare.label: Isbarbar dhig doorashooyinkayga
compare.description: Hore ayaan u aqaan aasaaska waxaanan rabaa inaan isbarbar dhigo daaweyno kala duwan

prepare.label: U diyaargarow wadahadalka
prepare.description: Waxaan rabaa inaan u diyaariyo su'aalo iyo fikrado balantayda xigta

support.label: Taageer qof kale
support.description: Waxaan ka caawiyaa qof qoyska ah ama saaxiib inuu fahmo doorashooyinkooda

notSure.label: Weli ma hubo
notSure.description: Keliya waxaan rabaa inaan sahamo oo arko macluumaadka la heli karo

visual.label: Sawirro iyo jaantusoyin muuqaal ah
visual.description: Sawirada, shaxanada iyo jaantusoyinku waxay i caawiyaan inaan fahmo

audio.label: Dhageysiiga macluumaadka
audio.description: Waxaan doorataa inaan maqlo macluumaadka oo kor loo akhriyo

reading.label: Akhrinta qoraalka
reading.description: Waxaan jeclahay inaan akhriyo macluumaad qoraal ah oo faahfaahsan

video.label: Daawashada fiidiyowyada
video.description: Fiidiyowyada iyo wareegyada ayaa igu shaqeysa ugu fiican

interactive.label: Qalabka isdhexgalka
interactive.description: Waxaan ku barannaa fal iyo sahaminta

levels.2: In yar oo aan raaxo ahayn

options.familyPartner: Haa, waxaan la noolahay qoys ama lammaane caawin kara
options.carers: Haa, waxaan leeyahay daryeel bixiyeyaal xirfadleyaal ah oo i caawiya
options.familyNearby: Haa, qoyskaagu waxay ku nool yihiin meel u dhow waxayna imaan karaan

options.longevity: Ku noolaanshaha inta ugu dheer ee suurtogalka ah

hub.title: Macluumaadkaaga La Habeeyey
hub.subtitle: Ku salaysan jawaabahaaga, waa kan waxa aan kugu talineyno inaad sahamiso.

welcome.title: Doorashooyinka Daaweynta ee Laguu Habeeyay
welcome.message: Ku salaysan waxa aad noo sheegtay, waa kuwan ilaha kaa caawin doona inaad fahamto xaaladda keliyahaaga oo aad sahamiso doorashooyinkaaga.
welcome.reminder: Xusuusnow, kooxda keliyahaagu way kaa caawin doonaan go'aanka ugu dambeya.

alert.title: Xusuuso inaad kaydiyo koobidaada
alert.message: Macluumaadkaaga lama kaydin doono ka dib kulankan. Samee koobid ka hor intaadan tegin si aad ugu hayso diiwaanka sahamintaada.

guided.title: Safarkaaga La Talinayo
guided.description: Raac waddo talaabo talaabo ah oo doorashooyinka daaweynta ee loo habeeyey xaaladaada. Ku habboon haddii aad rabto jiho cad iyo taageero.

free.title: Si Xor ah u Sahami
free.description: Baadh dhammaan doorashooyinka xawligaaga. Si toos ah ugu bood mawduucyada kugu xiiseeya. Ku habboon haddii aad hore u taqaan waxa aad raadineyso.

content.title: Qalabka Kaa Caawinaya Inaad Go'aansato
content.subtitle: Sahami qalab kasta si aad u sameyso go'aan cilmi ku dhisan

treatments.title: Doorashooyinka Daaweynta
treatments.description: Wax ka baro dhammaan doorashooyinka daaweynta keliyaha ee la heli karo oo ay ku jiraan noocyada dialysis-ka, bedddelida, iyo daryeelka meel-marka.

model.title: Sawirka 3D ee Keliyaha
model.description: Sahami sawirro 3D isdhexgal ah oo muujinaya sida daaweyno kala duwan ay ugu shaqeeyaan jidhkaaga. Si muuqaal ah u arag habka.

compare.title: Isbarbar Dhig Daaweynaha
compare.description: Arag dhammaan daaweynaha dhinac dhinac. Isbarbar dhig waxa kuugu muhiimsan - laga bilaabo wakhti maalinlaha ah ilaa dabacsanaanta safarka.

values.title: Jimicsiga Qiimaha
values.description: Ka fikir waxa kuugu muhiimsan. Jimicsigani wuxuu kaa caawiyaa inaad caddeeyso mudnaantaadaada si aad u hago go'aankaaga.

chat.title: Weydii Su'aalo
chat.description: La sheekeyso kaaliyahayaga AI ee ku saabsan doorashooyinka daaweynta keliyaha. Hel jawaabo su'aalahaaga si wadahadal ah.

lifeGoals.title: Waafaqsanaanta Hadafyada
lifeGoals.description: Arag sida daaweyntu ula jaanqaaddo hadafyadaada

statistics.title: Maxay doortay dadka kale
statistics.description: Arag waxay go'aansadeen dadka xaaladaha la midka

summary.title: Diyaar u tahay Dib u Eegidda Safarkaga?
summary.description: Arag wax kasta oo aad sahamiyay oo samee koobid si aad ula wadaagto kooxda keliyahaaga balantaada xigta.

treatments.title: Fahamka Doorashooyinka Daaweyntaada
treatments.subtitle: Waxaa jira siyaabo kala duwan oo lagu daaweeyo fashilka keliyaha. Mid kasta wuxuu leeyahay faa'iidooyin iyo arrimaha la tixgeliyo.

transplant.survival: Natiijada badbaadada ee ugu fiican muddada dheer
transplant.surgery: Waxay u baahan tahay qaliin iyo wakhti ka soo kabashada
transplant.medication: Daawada nolosha oo dhan ayaa loo baahan yahay

transplant.title: Beddelida Keliyaha
transplant.shortDescription: Helitaanka keliye caafimaad leh oo deeq bixiye ka yimid
transplant.description: Beddelida keliyaha waxay ku lug leedahay helitaanka keliye caafimaad leh oo ka yimid deeq bixiye nool (sida qof qoyska ah ama saaxiib) ama deeq bixiye dhintay. Bedddelid guuleysta waxay bixin kartaa tayada nolosha ugu fiican iyo badbaadada ugu dheer dad badan oo qaba fashilka keliyaha.
benefits: Badanaa waxay bixisaa tayada nolosha ugu fiican
Kulamo dialysis caadi ah looma baahna
Heerarka tamarta wanaagsan dadka intooda badan
considerations: Waxay u baahan tahay qaliin weyn
Looma baahan yahay in la qaato daawada hoos u dhigta difaaca jidhka nolosha oo dhan
Waxaa laga yaabaa inaad sugto keliye ku habboon

hemodialysis.title: Haemodialysis
hemodialysis.shortDescription: Nadiifinta dhiigga iyadoo la isticmaalayo mishiin
hemodialysis.description: Haemodialysis waxay isticmaashaa mishiin si ay dhiigaaga ugu nadiifiso dibadda jidhkaaga. Tani caadi ahaan waxaa lagu sameeyaa xarun dialysis oo isbitaal ku dhex taal ama xarun bulshada, badanaa saddex jeer toddobaadkii muddo ilaa afar saacadood kulan kasta. Dadka qaarkood waxay sameeyaan haemodialysis guriga.
benefits: Waxtar u leh ka saarista wasakhda iyo dareerta dheeraadka ah
La xiriir caadi ah kooxda daryeelka caafimaadka
Doorashada haemodialysis ee guriga ayaa loo heli karaa kuwa qaarkood
considerations: Waxay u baahan tahay booqashooyinka caadiga ah ee isbitaalka ama xarunta
Waxay u baahan tahay marin xidid (fistula ama tuubo)
Waxaa laga yaabaa inaad daal dareento ka dib daaweynta
Xaddidaadda cuntada iyo dareerta ayaa khuseysa

peritonealDialysis.title: Dialysis-ka Caloosha
peritonealDialysis.shortDescription: Nadiifinta dhiigga gudaha jidhka iyadoo la isticmaalayo daahda caloosha
peritonealDialysis.description: Dialysis-ka caloosha wuxuu isticmaalaa daahda calooshaada (peritoneum) sidii shaandho dabiici ah. Dareyro gaar ah ayaa lagu geliyaa calooshaada iyada oo loo marayo tuubo yar, waxay nuugtaa wasakhda, ka dibna way ka baxdaa. Tani waxaa lagu samayn karaa guriga, maalin ama habeen adiga oo hurda.
benefits: La sameeyey guriga, madax bannaanaan badan
Jidh ahaan ka tartiib badan, hoos iyo kor yar
considerations: Waxay u baahan tahay ballan maalinlaha ah ee daaweynta
Waxaad u baahan tahay tuubo joogto ah oo calooshaada ku taal
Khatarta infekshinka haddii farsamada aan la ilaalin
Waxay u baahan tahay meel kaydinta alaabta

conservative.title: Maaraynta Meel-marka
conservative.shortDescription: Maaraynta calaamadaha iyadoon la samayn dialysis
conservative.description: Maaraynta meel-marka waxay diirada saaraysaa ilaalinta tayada nolosha iyo maaraynta calaamadaha iyadoon la samayn dialysis ama bedddelid. Habkani wuxuu u fiicnaan karaa dadka qaarkood, gaar ahaan kuwa da'da ah, daciifka ah, ama qaba xaaladooyin caafimaad oo kale oo halis ah. Waxay ku lug leedahay maaraynta calaamadaha taxadar leh, daawooyinka, iyo taageerada kooxda daryeelka keliyaha.
benefits: Kulamo dialysis ama qaliin looma baahna
Waxay u fiicnaan kartaa dadka qaarkood ee da'da ah ama daciifka ah
Sii wad jadwalka caadiga ah intii suurto gal ah
considerations: Shaqada keliyaha ayaa sii hoos u dhici doonta
Calaamadaha ayaa u baahan doona maarayn firfircoon
Muhiim ah in la yeesho wadahadalada daacadnimada leh ee ku saabsan filashooyinka
Qorshaynta daryeelka hore ayaa lagu talinayaa

welcome.greeting: Salaamu alaykum! Waxaan ahay Kaaliyaha Daryeelka Keliyaha ee NHS. Waxaan halkan u joogaa inaan kaa caawiyo fahamka doorashooyinka daaweynta keliyaha.
welcome.prompt: Waxaad i weydiin kartaa su'aalo ku saabsan dialysis-ka, beddelida, daryeelka meel-marka, ama wax kasta oo kale oo la xiriira daaweynta keliyaha. Sideen maanta kaaga caawin karaa?

modelViewer.title: Muujiyaha Sawirka 3D ee Keliyaha
modelViewer.interactiveDescription: Sahami sawir 3D isdhexgal ah oo keliyaha aadanaha. Isticmaal mouse-kaaga ama taabashada si aad u wareejiso oo u weyneysid.
modelViewer.kidneyInfo: Keliyahaagu waa unugyaal sida digirta u eg oo ku dhow cabbirka contiidaada. Waxay nadiifiyaan qiyaas ahaan 200 litir oo dhiig ah maalintiiba, waxay ka saaraan wasakhda iyo dareerta dheeraadka ah.
modelViewer.functionInfo: Keliyuhu waxay habeeyaan cadaadiska dhiigga, waxay soo saaraan hormoonno, waxay dheelitiraan dareerta jidhka, waxayna shaandheeyan wasakhda kaadi noqota.
modelViewer.failureInfo: Marka keliyuhu lumiyaan shaqadooda, daaweyno sida dialysis-ka ama bedddelida waxay caawin karaan inay sameeyaan shaqada keliyahaagu ayna mar dambe samayn karaan.
modelViewer.learnMore: Wax Badan Ka Baro Doorashooyinka Daaweynta
modelViewer.continueJourney: Sii wad safarkaaga adigoo sahamaya doorashooyinka daaweynta

pd.overnight: Seexo inta APD ka shaqeyso habeenkii
pd.exchange4: Beddelashada ugu dambeysa ka hor seexashada

conservative.morning: Howlaha subaxda sida tamarta u ogolaato
conservative.visitors: Wakhti qoyska ama booqadeyaasha la socda
conservative.dinner: Casho kuwa aad jeceshahay la socda

scenario.title: Maxaa Haddii? Sahamiyaha Xaaladaha
scenario.subtitle: Arag sida xaaladaha nolosha kala duwani ugu shaqeeyaan doorasho daaweyn kasta

travel.title: Maxaa haddii aan rabo inaan safro?
travel.description: Sahami sida daaweyn kasta ay u saameyso awoodaada safarka fasaxyo ama booqashooyinka
travel.transplant: Ka dib ka soo kabashada, waad safri kartaa si xor ah. Qaado daawooyinka adigoo leh oo og halka daryeelka looga heli karo haddii loo baahdo.
travel.transplantTip2: Baadhitaan xaruumaha caafimaadka ee meeshaad aadayso
travel.transplantTip3: Ku xir daawada dheeraadka ah shandadaada gacanta
travel.hemodialysis: Safarka wuxuu u baahan yahay qorsheysi horudhac ah si loo habeeyo dialysis-ka meeshaad aadayso. Xaruumaha dialysis-ka fasaxa way jiraan laakiin helitaanku way kala duwan tahay.
travel.hemodialysisTip1: Dalbo dialysis-ka fasaxa 6-8 toddobaad ka hor
travel.hemodialysisTip2: Kooxda dialysis-kaagu waxay kaa caawin karaan habeynta
travel.hemodialysisTip3: Safarka UK-ga way ka fududahay caalami
travel.peritoneal: Xorriyad badan oo safarka. Alaabta waxaa loo keeni karaa meeshaad aadeyso ama waad qaadan kartaa.
travel.peritonealTip1: Habee gaarsiinta alaabta 4-6 toddobaad ka hor
travel.peritonealTip2: Diyaaradaha badanaa waxay ogol yihiin alaab dheeraad ah ee alaabta
travel.peritonealTip3: Waxaad u baahan tahay meel nadiif ah beddelashooyinka
travel.conservative: Xaddidaad dialysis ah la'aan, laakiin safarka wuxuu ku xidhan yahay sida aad dareemayso. Safarro gaagaaban ayaa laga yaabaa inay fududahaan maarayntooda.
travel.conservativeTip1: Kala hadal qorshooyinka safarka kooxda daryeelkaaga
travel.conservativeTip2: Si taxadar leh uga fikir caymiska safarka

work.title: Maxaa haddii aan rabo inaan wakhti buuxa u shaqeeyo?
work.description: Arag sida daaweyno kala duwan ugu habboon yihiin sii wadista shaqada
work.transplant: Ka dib 2-3 bilood oo ka soo kabasho ah, dadka intooda badan waxay ku soo noqon karaan shaqo wakhti buuxa oo leh heerar tamar ku dhow kuwa caadiga ah.
work.transplantTip1: U qorshee soo noqoshada shaqada marxalado ah
work.transplantTip2: Waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u baahato wakhti ka maqnaanshiyaha ballamada kiliinikga
work.transplantTip3: Shaqo bixiyeyaasha badan waxay bixiyaan habeyn dabacsan
work.hemodialysis: Waa suurtagal laakiin caqabad leh. Kulamadu waxay qaataan 4-5 saacadood saddex jeer toddobaadkii, oo lagu daray wakhti ka soo kabashada. Shiftiga fiidkii/aroorta hore ayaa caawini kara.
work.hemodialysisTip1: Kala hadal saacadaha dabacsan shaqo bixiyaha
work.hemodialysisTip2: Wakhtiyada dialysis-ka fiidkii ama aroorta hore
work.hemodialysisTip3: Haemodialysis-ka guriga wuxuu bixiyaa dabacsanaan badan
work.peritoneal: APD habeenkii macnaheedu waa maalmaha waa xor shaqada. CAPD waxay u baahan tahay nasashooyinka beddelashooyinka laakiin dad badan ayaa sii wada shaqaynaya.
work.peritonealTip1: APD wuu ku habboon yahay shaqaalaha wakhti buuxa
work.peritonealTip2: Waad samayn kartaa beddelashooyinka CAPD shaqada
work.peritonealTip3: Heerarka tamarta badanaa way ka wanaagsan yihiin HD
work.conservative: Waxay ku xidhan tahay calaamadaha iyo tamarta. Dad badan ayaa sii wada wakhti-qayb ama saacado la yareyay. Diirada waa tayada nolosha.
work.conservativeTip1: Ka fikir yareysta saacadaha tartiib tartiib

liveAlone.title: Maxaa haddii aan keligay noolahay?
liveAlone.description: Fahamo daaweyno wanaagsan u shaqeeya dadka madax bannaan u nool
liveAlone.transplant: Waxaad u baahan doontaa taageero muddada ka soo kabashada (2-4 toddobaad), laakiin ka dib waad u noolaan kartaa madax bannaan ahaan.
liveAlone.transplantTip1: Habee caawin toddobaadyada ugu horreeya ka dib qaliinka
liveAlone.transplantTip2: Hayso xiriirka degdegga ee la heli karo
liveAlone.hemodialysis: Daaweynta waxaa lagu sameeyaa xarun shaqaale xirfadleyaal ah. Habeynta guriga looma baahna. Xiriir caadi ah kooxda daryeelka caafimaadka.
liveAlone.hemodialysisTip1: Gaadiidka isbitaalka ayaa la heli karaa
liveAlone.hemodialysisTip2: Shaqaaluhu way ku la socdaan muddada daaweynta
liveAlone.peritoneal: Dad badan ayaa si guul leh u sameya PD keligood. Tababarka wuu kuu diyaariyaa si wanaagsan. Taageerada telefoonka 24/7 waa la heli karaa.
liveAlone.peritonealTip2: Booqashooyin caadi ah oo kalkaalisooyinka PD guriga
liveAlone.peritonealTip3: Khadka caawimaadda 24-saac ee xaaladaha degdegga ah
liveAlone.conservative: Bilowga way maarmi kartaa keligaa. Sida calaamadaha u horumaraan, waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u baahato taageero sii kordheysa. Adeegyada bulshada ayaa caawin kara.
liveAlone.conservativeTip1: Hubinno caadi ah oo kooxda daryeelka
liveAlone.conservativeTip2: Adeegyada taageerada bulshada waa la heli karaa
liveAlone.conservativeTip3: Hore u qorshee baahiyaha daryeelka mustaqbalka

family.title: Maxaa haddii aan leeyahay caruur yaryar?
family.description: Ka fikir sida daaweynaha ay u saameyaan daryeelida carruurta iyo wakhtiga qoyska
family.transplant: Ka dib ka soo kabashada, waad si buuxda uga qayb qaadan kartaa nolosha qoyska. Tayada nolosha ugu fiican ee waalidiinta firfircoon.
family.transplantTip1: Habee daryeelka carruurta muddada ka soo kabashada
family.transplantTip2: Ku noqon kartaa howlaha waalidnimada caadiga ah
family.hemodialysis: Wakhti caadi ah oo guriga ka maqan daaweynta. Daalka ka dib kulamada wuxuu saameysi karaa howlaha qoyska. Daryeelka carruurtu waa loo baahan yahay muddada kulamada.
family.hemodialysisTip1: U qorshee kulamada inta saacadaha iskuulka
family.hemodialysisTip2: Ka qayb geli carruurta si da'da ku habboon
family.hemodialysisTip3: U qorshee wakhtiga qoyska maalmaha aan dialysis-ka ahayn
family.peritoneal: Daaweynta guriga macnaheedu waa wakhti badan oo qoyska. APD habeenkii ayuu ka tagaa maalmaha xor ah daryeelka carruurta.
family.peritonealTip1: APD waxay dhacaa inta carruurtu seexanayaan
family.peritonealTip2: Maalmaha ayaa xor u ah dhigidda iskuulka
family.peritonealTip3: Carruurta si ammaan ah waa lagu dari karaa
family.conservative: Jadwal daaweyn la'aan, laakiin heerarka tamarta way kala duwan yihiin. Diirada wakhtiga tayada leh ee qoyska.
family.conservativeTip2: Aqbal caawinta daryeelka carruurta marka loo baahdo
family.conservativeTip3: Yeelo wadahadalada daacadda ah ee carruurta

treatment.faqDesc: Su'aalaha bukaamadu badanaa ka weydiyaan daawayntan

glossary.title: Qaamuuska Erayada Caafimaadka
glossary.subtitle: Qeexitaanno fudud, luqad cad oo erayada caafimaadka ee la xiriira cudurka keliyaha iyo daaweynta. Isticmaal sanduuqa raadinta ama ka saar qaybta si aad u hesho waxa aad u baahan tahay.

noResults.title: Eray lama helin
noResults.message: Isku day inaad hagaajiso raadintaada ama shaandhada si aad u hesho waxa aad raadineyso.

help.title: Ma u baahan tahay caawin badan oo faham?
help.description: Haddii aadan heli karin eray ama aad u baahan tahay sharaxaad badan, kaaliyahayaga AI wuxuu kaa caawin karaa inuu ka jawaabo su'aalahaaga ku saabsan cudurka keliyaha iyo daaweynaha.

dialysis.title: Dialysis-ka
dialysis.definition: Daaweyn sameysa qaar ka mid ah shaqada keliyahaagu ayna mar dambe samayn karaan. Waxay ka saartaa wasakhda, cusbooyinka dheeraadka ah iyo biyaha dhiigaaga. Waxaa jira laba nooc oo waaweyn: haemodialysis iyo dialysis-ka caloosha.

haemodialysis.title: Haemodialysis (HD)
haemodialysis.definition: Nooc dialysis ah oo isticmaala mishiin si uu dhiigaaga ugu nadiifiyo dibadda jidhkaaga. Dhiigga waxaa lagaaga soo saaraa jidhkaaga iyada oo loo marayo tuubooyinka mishiinka dialysis-ka, kaas oo ka saara wasakhda iyo dareerta dheeraadka ah, ka dibna soo celiyo dhiigga nadiifka ah jidhkaaga. Badanaa waxaa la sameeyaa 3 jeer toddobaadkii muddo ilaa 4 saacadood kulan kasta.

peritonealDialysis.title: Dialysis-ka Caloosha (PD)
peritonealDialysis.definition: Nooc dialysis ah oo isticmaala daahda calooshaada, oo la yiraahdo peritoneum, sidii shaandho dabiici ah. Dareyro gaar ah ayaa lagu geliyaa calooshaada iyada oo loo marayo tuubo jilicsan, halkaas oo ay ku nuugtaa wasakhda iyo dareerta dheeraadka ah, ka dibna way ka baxdaa. Waxaa lagu samayn karaa guriga.

apd.title: APD (Dialysis-ka Caloosha ee Tooska ah)
apd.definition: Nooc dialysis caloosha ah halkaas oo mishiin ay si toos ah u sameeyo beddelashooyinka, badanaa adiga oo hurda habeenkii. Mishiinku wuxuu buuxiyaa oo ka soo daadiyo dareerta dialysis-ka calooshaada dhowr jeer habeenkii, isagoo ka tagaya maalmaha xor ah.

capd.title: CAPD (Dialysis-ka Caloosha ee Joogtada ah ee Socda)
capd.definition: Nooc dialysis caloosha ah halkaas oo adiga si gacmeed ah aad u beddesho dareerta calooshaada, badanaa 3-4 jeer maalintii. Beddelashada kasta waxay qaadataa qiyaas ahaan 30-40 daqiiqo. Waxaad ku samayn kartaa guriga, shaqada, ama safarka.

dialysate.title: Dialysate
dialysate.definition: Dareerta gaarka ah ee loo isticmaalo dialysis-ka si looga caawiyo ka saarista wasakhda iyo biyaha dheeraadka ah dhiigaaga. Dialysis-ka caloosha, waa dareerta gasha calooshaada. Dareerta waxay soo jiidataa wasakhda iyo biyaha dheeraadka ah dhiigaaga iyada oo loo marayo peritoneum-ka.

dialysisAdequacy.title: Ku Filnaanta Dialysis-ka
dialysisAdequacy.definition: Cabbirka sida daaweyntaada dialysis-ka ay u shaqeyneyso. Kooxda keliyahaagu mar walba ayay hubisaa tan iyaga oo isticmaala baaritaanno dhiig si ay u hubiyaan inaad heleysid dialysis ku filan si aad u caafimaad qaadato.

transplant.title: Beddelida Keliyaha
transplant.definition: Qaliin lagu dhigo keliye caafimaad leh oo ka yimid deeq bixiye jidhkaaga. Keliyaha cusubi wuxuu qaataa shaqada nadiifinta dhiigaaga. Bedddelid guuleysta macnaheedu waa inaadan u baahnayn dialysis, inkastoo aad u baahan doonto inaad qaadato daawooyinka noloshaada oo dhan si aad uga hortagto jidhkaaga diidmada keliyaha cusub.

livingDonor.title: Deeq Bixiye Nool
livingDonor.definition: Qof nool oo deeq bixiya mid ka mid ah keliyihiisa qof u baahan bedddelid. Deeq bixiyeyaasha nool badanaa waa xubnaha qoyska ama saaxiibada dhow, laakiin waxay sidoo kale noqon karaan dad raba inay caawiyaan qof aysan aqoon (deeq bixiyeyaasha altruistic). Dadku waxay ku noolaan karaan nolol caafimaad leh iyadoo keliya hal keliye.

deceasedDonor.title: Deeq Bixiye Dhintay
deceasedDonor.definition: Keliye ka yimid qof dhintay oo ogolaaday inuu deeq bixiyo unugyihiisa, ama qoyskoodu ogolaaday. Dadka badankood ee hela bedddelida keliyaha waxay ka helaan deeq bixiye dhintay.

immunosuppressants.title: Daawada Hoos u Dhigta Difaaca Jidhka
immunosuppressants.definition: Daawooyinka yaraynaya firfircoonida nidaamka difaacaaga. Ka dib bedddelida keliyaha, waxaad u baahan tahay inaad qaadato daawooyinkan noloshaada oo dhan si aad uga joojiso jidhkaaga inuu weeraro oo diido keliyaha cusub. Waxay kaa dhigi karaan inaad badanaa hesho infekshino.

rejection.title: Diidmada
rejection.definition: Marka nidaamka difaacaaga jidhkaagu uu aqoonsado keliyaha la bedelay inuu yahay shisheeye oo isku dayo inuu weeraro. Tani waa sababta aad u baahan tahay inaad qaadato daawooyinka hoos u dhiga difaaca jidhka ka dib bedddelida. Calaamadaha waxaa ka mid noqon kara dareen xanuun ah, xummad, ama kaadi yar.

tissueTyping.title: Noocaynta Unugga
tissueTyping.definition: Baaritaan dhiig ah oo eega calaamadaha unugyahaaga si loo caawiyo helitaanka keliye ku habboon. Sida u dhow ee isku dhigmada adiga iyo deeq bixiyaha, sida ay u sarrayaan fursadaha bedddelid guuleysta.

waitingList.title: Liiska Sugitaanka Beddelida
waitingList.definition: Liiska qaranka ee dadka sugaya bedddelida keliyaha ee ka timaado deeq bixiye dhintay. Marka keliye ku habboon la helo, waxaa loogu dhigaa qof liiska ku jira iyadoo lagu saleynayo nooca dhiigga, nooca unugga, iyo arrimaha kale.

kidneyFunction.title: Shaqada Keliyaha
kidneyFunction.definition: Sida keliyahaagu u shaqeynayaan. Keliyahaagu waxay shaandheeyan wasakhda iyo biyaha dheeraadka ah dhiigaaga, waxay caawiyaan xakameynta cadaadiska dhiigga, waxay soo saaraan hormoonno, waxayna caafimaadka u hayaan lafaaha. Shaqada keliyaha waxaa lagu cabiraa baaritaanno dhiig iyo kaadi.

egfr.title: eGFR (Qiyaasta Heerka Nadiifinta Glomerular)
egfr.definition: Cabbirka sida keliyahaagu si fiican ugu nadiifiyo wasakhda dhiigaaga. Waxaa lagu xisaabiyaa baaritaan dhiig ah oo cabira creatinine. eGFR caadi waa ka sareeya 90. Ka hoose 15 badanaa macnaheedu waa fashilka keliyaha iyo baahida daaweynta sida dialysis-ka ama beddelida.

creatinine.title: Creatinine
creatinine.definition: Wasakh ay sameeyan muruqyadaada oo caadi ahaan ay ka saaraan keliyahaagu. Baaritaanka dhiigga wuxuu cabiraa inta creatinine ahi ku jirto dhiigaaga. Heerarka sare waxay noqon karaan calaamad ah in keliyahaagu aysan u shaqeynayn sida ay tahay.

ckd.title: CKD (Cudurka Keliyaha ee Raaga)
ckd.definition: Xaalad muddo dheer ah halkaas oo keliyahaagu aysan u shaqeynayn sida ay tahay. CKD waxaa loo qaybiyaa marxaladaha 1-5 iyadoo lagu saleynayo sida keliyahaagu u shaqeynayaan, marxalada 5 ay tahay tan ugu daran (fashilka keliyaha). Dad badan oo qaba CKD waxay ku noolaan karaan nolol caadi ah iyadoo daaweyn.

kidneyFailure.title: Fashilka Keliyaha
kidneyFailure.definition: Marka keliyahaagu aysan mar dambe si fiican u shaqeyn karin iyagoo keligood si ay caafimaad kuugu hayaan. Sidoo kale waxaa loo yaqaan cudurka keliyaha ee marxalada ugu dambeysa ama marxalada 5 CKD. Marxaladan, waxaad u baahan tahay daaweyn sida dialysis-ka ama bedddelida keliyaha si aad u noolaato.

uraemia.title: Uraemia
uraemia.definition: Is uruurinta wasakhda dhiigaaga ee dhacda marka keliyahaagu aysan si fiican u nadiifin karin. Calaamadaha waxaa ka mid noqon kara dareen daal ah, xanuun, maqaarka cuncunaya, cunno yar, iyo dhibaato fikirka. Dialysis-ka ama beddelida ayaa caawin kara ka saarista wasakhdan.

fistula.title: Fistula (AV Fistula)
fistula.definition: Nooc gelitaan haemodialysis ah oo lagu abuuray qaliin yar oo ku xira xidid ilaa xidid, badanaa gacantaada. Tani waxay ka dhigtaa xididka inuu weynaan oo xoog badnaan si loo isticmaalo dialysis-ka. Fistula waxaa loo tixgeliyaa nooca gelitaanka ugu fiican ee haemodialysis-ka.

graft.title: Beeritaanka (AV Graft)
graft.definition: Nooc gelitaan haemodialysis ah halkaas oo tuubo balaastig jilicsan loo isticmaalo in lagu xiro xidid ilaa xidid, badanaa gacantaada. Tan waxaa loo isticmaalaa marka xididyadaada aan ku habbonayn fistula.

catheter.title: Catheter (Tuubada Dialysis-ka)
catheter.definition: Tuubo jilicsan oo lagu geliyo xidid weyn, badanaa qoorta ama xabadka, si loo oggolaado gelitaanka haemodialysis-ka. Catheter waxaa la isticmaali karaa isla markiiba laakiin waxay leedahay khatarta infekshinka ka sarreysa fistula ama beeritaanka.

pdCatheter.title: PD Catheter (Tenckhoff Catheter)
pdCatheter.definition: Tuubo jilicsan, dabacsan oo lagu dhigo calooshaada qaliin yar. Waxaa loo isticmaalaa in lagu geliyo dareerta dialysis-ka oo laga soo daadsha muddada dialysis-ka caloosha. Tuubada waxay ku taallaa meesha waxayna badanaa ka soo baxdaa in yar ka hoose xudduntaada.

vascularAccess.title: Gelitaanka Xididka
vascularAccess.definition: Habka dhiigga looga soo saarayo jidhkaaga oo dib loogu soo celiyo haemodialysis-ka. Tan waxaa loo mari karaa fistula, beeritaan, ama catheter dialysis-ka. Gelitaanka xididka wanaagsan ayaa muhiim u ah daaweynta haemodialysis-ka ee wax ku oolka ah.

conservativeCare.title: Daryeelka Meel-marka
conservativeCare.definition: Hab daaweyn oo diirada saara maaraynta calaamadaha iyo ilaalinta tayada nolosha iyadoon la samayn dialysis ama bedddelid. Waxay ku lug leedahay daawooyinka, isbeddelada cuntada, iyo taageerada kooxda keliyahaaga. Dadka qaarkood waxay doorataan doorashadan, gaar ahaan kuwa da'da ah ama qaba xaaladooyin caafimaad oo halis ah.

supportiveCare.title: Daryeelka Taageerada
supportiveCare.definition: Daryeelka kaa caawiya inaad ku noolaato si wanaagsan xaaladaada keliyaha. Waxaa ka mid ah maaraynta calaamadaha sida xanuunka, daalka, iyo lallabada, iyo sidoo kale taageerada dareenka iyo dhaqameed adiga iyo qoyskaaga. Daryeelka taageerada waxaa la bixin karaa iyadoo la socda daaweyno kale.

palliativeCare.title: Daryeelka Qabowga
palliativeCare.definition: Daryeelka takhasusliga ah ee diirada saara raaxada iyo tayada nolosha halkii la daweeyo cudurka. Kooxaha daryeelka qabowga waxay caawinayaan maaraynta calaamadaha oo waxay bixiyaan taageero dareen. Daryeelkan waxaa la bixin karaa marxalad kasta oo cudurka keliyaha, ma aha keliya dhammaadka nolosha.

renalTeam.title: Kooxda Keliyaha (Kooxda Daryeelka Keliyaha)
renalTeam.definition: Kooxda xirfadlayaasha daryeelka caafimaadka ee ku dayacaya. Tan badanaa waxaa ka mid ah dhakhaatiirta keliyaha (nephrologists), kalkaaliso takhasuslayaal ah, calalliyeyaal, la taliyayaal, iyo kuwa kale. Waxay wadajir u shaqeeyaan si ay kuu siiyaan daryeelka iyo taageerada ugu fiican.

nephrologist.title: Nephrologist
nephrologist.definition: Dhakhtar ku takhasusay cudurrada keliyaha. Nephrologist-kaaga wuxuu hogaamiyaa kooxda daryeelka keliyahaaga wuxuuna kaa caawiyaa inaad go'aamiso daaweyntaada. Waa khubarada dhammaan noocyada xaaladaha keliyaha iyo daaweynaha.

anaemia.title: Dhiig Yaraanta
anaemia.definition: Xaalad halkaas oo aad leedahay unugyada dhiiga cas oo ka yar caadiga, taas oo kaa dhigi karta dareen daal ah iyo neeftuur. Waxay caadi ku tahay dadka qaba cudurka keliyaha sababtoo ah keliyuhu waxay soo saaraan hormoon (erythropoietin) oo caawinaya abuurista unugyada dhiiga cas. Daaweyntu waxay ku lug leedahay durriyadaha ama kaabsiyaasha birta.

bloodPressure.title: Cadaadiska Dhiigga
bloodPressure.definition: Xoogga dhiigga ku riixaya derbiyada xididyadaada. Cadaadiska dhiigga sare wuxuu caadi u yahay cudurka keliyaha wuxuuna ka sii darin karaa dhaawaca keliyaha. Xakameynta cadaadiska dhiigga daawooyinka iyo isbeddelada nolosha waa qayb muhiim ah oo daryeelka keliyaha.

fluidBalance.title: Dheelitirnaanta Dareerta
fluidBalance.definition: Dheelitirnaanta u dhaxeysa inta dareyro aad qaadato iyo inta ka baxda jidhkaaga. Marka keliyuhu aysan si fiican u shaqeynayn, ma saari karaan dareerta dheeraadka ah, taas oo keeni karta bararka iyo neef la'aanta. Waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u baahato inaad xaddido inta aad caabbato.

potassium.title: Potassium
potassium.definition: Macdanta laga helo cuntooyinka badan ee ka caawiya muruqyadaada iyo wadnahaagu inay si sax ah u shaqeeyaan. Marka keliyuhu aysan si fiican u shaqeynayn, potassium-ku wuxuu isu uruurin karaa heerar halis ah dhiigaaga. Waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u baahato inaad xaddido cuntooyinka potassium badan sida muuska, liin dhanaanka, iyo baradhuhu.

phosphate.title: Phosphate
phosphate.definition: Macdanta laga helo cuntooyinka badan ee ka caawisa dhisidda lafo xoog leh. Marka keliyuhu aysan si fiican u shaqeynayn, phosphate wuxuu isu uruurin karaa dhiigaaga oo uu daciifin karaa lafaaha. Waxaa laga yaabaa inaad u baahato inaad qaadato kiniiniyada la yiraahdo phosphate binders cuntada iyo inaad xaddido cuntooyin qaar.

lifeGoals.title: Waafaqsanaanta Hadafyada Nolosha
lifeGoals.subtitle: Arag sida daaweyntu ula jaanqaaddo hadafyadaada shaqsiyeed
lifeGoals.introduction: Fahamka sida daaweeyn kastaa ula dhiganto waxa muhiimka kuu ah noloshaada waxay kaa caawin kartaa go'aanka.

work.name: Shaqo iyo Xirfad
work.description: Hadafyada la xiriira shaqadaada iyo noloshaada xirfadeed

hobbies.name: Madadaalo iyo Hawlaha
hobbies.description: Hadafyada la xiriira ciyaaraha iyo xiisaha

discussionPrompts.title: Su'aalaha Laga Wada Hadlo
discussionPrompts.prompt1: Sidee daaweyntan u saameyn doontaa habkayga maalinlaha?
discussionPrompts.prompt3: Waa maxay isbeddelada aan sameyn doono?

page.title: Maxay doortay dadka xaaladaha la mid ah
page.introduction: Fahamka waxa dadka kale ay doortay waa caawin kara. Kuwani waa tiro koob dhabta ah oo ka mid ah bukaanada kelyaha UK.
